arts.ttl: Daniel Farke press conference LIVE as Leeds United boss reacts to comfortable Cardiff City win
arts.sum: Follow everything the manager has to say about Saturday afternoon's match below as we bring you most of the questions and answers in full from the debrief. It meant Largie Ramazani was given his full debut in place of the Israeli.

arts.ttl: Hilarious Joel Piroe insight emerges as Leeds United leave Cardiff City laughing, Swansea fans will love it
arts.sum: Leeds United beat Cardiff City 2-0 thanks to goals from Largie Ramazani and Joel Piroe, with the latter coming off the bench to secure the three points. Fresh impetus was finally brought later in the game when Joel Piroe was introduced in place of Ramazani, and Piroe’s chance came on the counter as Cardiff made a rare venture up field.

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke makes Joel Piroe point as Leeds United boss questions squad mentality
arts.sum: We all have to be a bit more like Joel Piroe, probably the best finisher in this league, one chance, one goal, he deserves more praise. (I) want us to be more greedy to score goals."

arts.ttl: What 'hurt' Cardiff City against Leeds United as under-fire Erol Bulut makes honest admission
arts.sum: Beleaguered Cardiff City boss Erol Bulut bemoaned the "mistakes" his side made in possession after their 2-0 defeat to Leeds United. He was critical of the mistake defender Calum Chambers in the build up to United's second goal.
Leeds returned to winning ways at 10-man Cardiff as the two clubs remembered their former player Sol Bamba.

arts.ttl: The poor Cardiff City v Leeds United player ratings as attack anonymous and player sees red
arts.sum: This is how the Bluebirds players rated in the 2-0 defeat by Leeds United

arts.ttl: Cardiff City were “absolutely petrified” of what Leeds United star was doing today
arts.sum: Mateo Joseph has been leading the line for Leeds United with a lot of all-round quality, and notched a third assist when he flicked a pass through to Largie Ramazani for an opener against Cardiff City. Setting up the goal was Mateo Joseph, dropping deep to win a loose ball against Cardiff’s centre-backs, flicking through the gap into the path of the Leeds full debutant.

arts.ttl: Joel Piroe on target for Leeds at Cardiff as Sol Bamba is remembered
arts.sum: Daniel Farke’s side eased to victory after Bluebirds defender Joel Bagan was sent off in the first half.

arts.ttl: Cardiff City 0-2 Leeds United: Pressure piles on Erol Bulut as 10-man Bluebirds succumb to fifth loss in six games
arts.sum: The Bluebirds hosted Leeds United in today's instalment of Championship action and lost 2-0

arts.ttl: Leeds United player ratings with Gnonto and Ramazani classy in Cardiff City win
arts.sum: The second half saw the domination continue for the visitors, but the chances dried up somewhat until Jayden Bogle was fouled for a penalty. Joel Piroe came on late to score the crucial second goal.
